name: PKStrokePointReference
desc: A class that represents the properties of a specific point along a strokeâ€™s path.

items.name: init(location: CGPoint, timeOffset: TimeInterval, size: CGSize, opacity: CGFloat, force: CGFloat, azimuth: CGFloat, altitude: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a new point with the provided properties.

items.name: var timeOffset: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time offset since the start of the stroke path in seconds.

items.name: var altitude: CGFloat
items.desc: The altitude of this point in radians.

items.desc: The azimuth of this point in radians.

items.name: var force: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of force applied by the touch.
